column5: Got out with a friend this morning on the NY side of the Upper Niagara where Bass season is open. Took us awhile but we finally found some decent fish. They were in about 10-12 fow and really only wanted a certain clour of tubes...We landed a bunch in a few hours, all were 3 lbs.+ and a couple were near 5 lbs.
Nice Bass !!!!!!!!!,so half the width of the river is open for Bass?
Nope, just east of the invisible line...
